description.value:
You replicate the fiery venom of the tor linnorm and inflict an enemy with the dread dragon's debilitating bite. You deal @Damage[2d12[piercing]] damage to the targeted creature and afflict it with tor linnorm venom. If the target takes piercing damage, they must attempt a Fortitude save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes @Damage[8d6[fire]] damage.

Failure The target is afflicted with Tor Linnorm Venom at stage 1.

Critical Failure The target is afflicted with tor linnorm venom at stage 2.

Tor Linnorm Venom (fire, injury, poison) Level 17

Maximum Duration 10 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[8d6[fire]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[12d6[fire]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 2} (1 round)
